duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of assigned Branch(es), including Leading, Coaching, Managing, and Business Development.
Promote positive public image in the community, instill the Purpose, Mission, and Values in the team, and support the Truist culture.
Drive the Business Development of the branch to deliver strong team performance and individual performance through personal productivity.
Participate in civic, government, professional, business, community affairs, associations, and groups to prospect and develop new business through community involvement and build the Brand.
Responsible for successfully executing on the Branch Engagement Routines by leading, growing, coaching, and motivating teammates and engaging the client base through effective outbound calling.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent education and related training or experience.
SAFE Mortgage Licensing Act compliance within 30 days of employment in this role.
